<!-- Before criticising this freeware, please read the TrueCrypt page I link to in the following paragraph. *ALL* software-based disk encryption programs are vulnerable to tampering!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! -->

<!-- Before criticising this software, please read the TrueCrypt page I link to in the following paragraph. *ALL* software-based disk encryption programs are vulnerable to tampering!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! -->
TrueCrypt is vulnerable to various attacks. To prevent certain types of attack, the TrueCrypt website recommends users follow various security precautions<ref>http://www.truecrypt.org/docs/?s=security-requirements-and-precautions TrueCrypt page: Security Requirements and Precautions</ref>.
